creator: aleksandersen+issues.apache.org@runbox.com
text:
Hi,

Header always unset "Content-Location"

The above instruction is ignored when used in the following scenario. When used without another filter in the negotiated variant, it works like a charm.


/.htaccess contains:
SetHandler type-map .var
SetHandler php5 .php
Header always unset "Content-Location"


/test.var contains:

URI: test

URI: test.hpp?secrets=of&darkness=true&sub=marine
Content-Type: text/html
I can't reproduce the behaviour you describe.  If you still think there's a bug, please reopen with details of how to provoke it.
creator: nick@webthing.com
